name: Verify invalid password error
description: Verify that the system displays an appropriate error message when a user attempts to login with an invalid password
testObjective: Validate that authentication properly rejects invalid credentials and displays user-friendly error messages
author: QA Team
preconditions: User account exists in the system

steps.expected: Login page loads with email and password fields visible
Password field is populated (characters are masked)
Error message is displayed: 'Invalid email or password'

steps.action: Verify user remains on login page
steps.expected: User is not authenticated and stays on login page

postconditions: Error message is visible to user
